thread.title: Chemical weapons watchdog investigates Ghouta attacks

title: Chemical weapons watchdog investigates Ghouta attacks
text:
Chemical weapons watchdog investigates Ghouta attacks 4:22am IST - 01:53 
The world’s chemical weapons watchdog opened an investigation on Sunday into attacks in the besieged, rebel-held Syrian region of eastern Ghouta to determine whether banned munitions had been used, diplomatic sources told Reuters. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The world’s chemical weapons watchdog opened an investigation on Sunday into attacks in the besieged, rebel-held Syrian region of eastern Ghouta to determine whether banned munitions had been used, diplomatic sources told Reuters.
